How Gemini made my new Linkedin profile picture:

1. Upload a simple photo of you.
2. Upload a reference profile picture you love.
3. Copy & paste the following prompt:
4. I wrote a guide to gain 10,000 Linkedin followers.
5. Go here to access it: https://lnkd.in/eifHDEGu

Prompt: “Generate a corporate headshot of my image in [how you are dressed] in the same style as the 2nd image I uploaded as an inspiration”.

6. If you don’t have any inspiration, copy this prompt (with your upload): https://lnkd.in/eifHDEGu

I don't need an expensive photographer.

And this is a shock to me too (me, the AI guy).

If you know someone who needs a new LinkedIn photo, send it to them or save this guide for later.

Follow Ruben never to miss my daily post.
